e: ￹`Ma~`tefad~ `to~ `koya~ `wawa~ `nai~ `kilang~.￺The child fell from a tree.￻那孩子從樹上跌落下來
￹`Ma~`tefad~ `to~ `ko~ `faloco'~ `ako~￺My heart fell / i.e. I lost hope / became disillusioned￻我已絕望了
￹`Yo~ `lifet~`en~ `no~ `tawki~ `ci~`nngra~ `i~, `ma~`tefad~ `to~ `cingra~.￺When the boss tested him he failed.￻當老闆考驗他時，他失敗了
￹`Ma~`tefad~ `to~ `ko~ `ngangan~ `noya~ `tadamaan~`ay~ `a~ `tamdaw~.￺That man of honor lost his reputatioin.￻那位有名望的人名譽掃地 (一落千丈)
d.f: ￹￺to fall with literal and figurative meanings￻掉落，墮落，含字面上和比喻上的意義
